QuestData.Title: Borrowed Brew
QuestData.Description: A delicious smell wafts out from the bottle on the table.$B$BA little taste couldn't hurt, right?
QuestData.RewardText: I heard your people had washed up on our shores, but I did not expect to find one washed up on my very doorstep! What brings you here, stranger?$b$b<You explain about your search for Prince Anduin, and describe the boy to the pandaren.>$b$bVery interesting! And so the Pearlfin sent you to me, did they?
